articles.title: Four new astronauts arrive at the International Space Station to replace NASA’s evacuated crew
articles.description:
SpaceX delivered the U.S., French and Russian astronauts a day after launching them from Cape Canaveral.

The post Four new astronauts arrive at the International Space Station to replace NASA’s evacuated crew appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Four astronauts arrived at the ISS on February 15, 2026, after SpaceX launch.
NASA's crew was evacuated, prompting the arrival of U.S., French, and Russian replacements.
Boston residents benefit from ongoing space research and technology advancements from the ISS.

articles.title: TSA agents are working without pay at US airports due to another shutdown
articles.description:
TSA officers also worked through the record shutdown that ended Nov. 12, but aviation experts say this one may play out differently.

The post TSA agents are working without pay at US airports due to another shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: TSA agents at Boston Logan Airport are working without pay during the current government shutdown.
This shutdown follows a record closure that ended on November 12, 2023.
Local travelers may experience longer wait times due to reduced TSA staffing.
